TRX
Tron Wallet Send Receive Settings
Not available in cold wallet An cold wallet will never connect to the Internet and is only used to sign transactions.

For even greater security, you should also never connect your device to the Internet.

Use another device with the Tron Wallet App and import your public address to have an overview of your wallet and sign transactions from it. Invalid Transaction No valid transaction was detected. Scan the QR code of your transaction Cold Wallet Scan your public address QR code. Scan your private key QR code. Import Address You are about to import only your entered address.

You won't be able to make a transaction without your cold wallet. Invalid Address Enter a valid address You can't send to your own address Invalid Amount Please enter an amount between %d and %s Asset: To: Amount: Confirm Transaction Send Sending Sent successfully Sending failed Scan the QR code you want to send to. Scan the QR code of your signed transaction from your cold wallet Confirm Votes Sign to submit Submit Votes submitted successfully Submitting failed Try again later Available: Amount To Asset Private Key Address Account Continue Store the private key and your 24 words recovery phrase securely!
e.g. on a piece of paper in a safe.

Losing both would end access to your account forever! I am aware of the risks New Password Your password is important for every transaction. Without password you won't be able to access your assets through the wallet! Generate Address and Private Key or Public Address Your private key is needed to sign transactions and access your assets Import public address only Use this option when you already created a cold wallet or just want an overview of your account Scan your unsigned transaction with your cold wallet device to sign it. I've signed my transaction Scan your signed transaction Scan your signed transaction with your other device to complete your transaction. Remaining Votes: Submit Votes Search Search Scan QR code to get your address or click to copy. Recent Blocks Recent Transactions Scan a transaction QR code to sign it. Balance Token COLD WALLET Receive Balance: Assets: Votes: Last Operation: Produced by Port: IP: Vote Total Votes: Produced: Missed: Last Block: 24 words recovery phrase 24 words recovery phrase Your private key will be recovered using your recovery phrase. Invalid Recovery Phrase Please enter all 24 words of your recovery phrase. Couldn't create transaction.
Check internet connection and node settings Freeze TRX can be frozen to gain Tron Power(TP).
For every TP you get a vote for super delegates and bandwidth based on the ratio to the total frozen amount on the network and yours.
Your TRX will be frozen for 3 days, after which they can be unfrozen.
Unfreezing removes TP's and your bandwidth.
You have 5000 free bandwidth per day.
Unfreeze Confirm Freezing Freeze Freezing Friezed successfully Freezing failed Frozen Confirm Unfreezing Unfreezing Failed Unfreezing Unfreeze successfully Remove Wallet Secret Account Info Connection Confirm Remove Remove You are about to remove this wallet.

Please make sure you have your private key or recovery phrase before removing this wallet, otherwise you will lose your access to your account.

Other wallets will remain You are about to remove this wallet.

You'll only remove your public address, so there is no risk.
